titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to drug testing of unemployment compensation applicants.
A joint resolution disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to drug testing of unemployment compensation applicants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This joint resolution nullifies the rule finalized by the Department of Labor on August 1, 2016, relating to establishing, for state unemployment compensation program purposes, occupations that regularly conduct drug testing.
